topic.title: Get access to Qodana Cloud
topic.p: You can get access to %product% via an invitation link. After you click the invitation link, the %product% homepage will open. Here, you can overview reports of publicly available and demo projects.
To create an account at %product%, click the **Log in** button in the upper right corner of the UI.
On the Log in page, you can create a JetBrains account or use the existing account instead. Once you complete this step, choose the account type, either commercial or personal.

If you choose the commercial type of account, you will be able to create a business account or join the existing account of your company. If you plan to use %product% for personal purposes, choose the personal account.
For more information about organizations in %product%, see the Manage organizations section.

note.p: Using a personal account, you will not be able to bind your personal account to a company or perform any actions on behalf of your company. Personal accounts are always associated with the My organization company, which cannot be changed.

topic.p: Use the Log in button to log into %product%.
Depending on your registration at %product%, a specific role will be assigned to your account. For more details, see the User roles section.
